title: Akij Group Supply Chain Optimization Initiative
description: Led comprehensive supply chain transformation at Akij Group, optimizing procurement KPIs across Quality, Inventory, Delivery, and Cost Savings. Implemented data-driven solutions that resolved shipping bottlenecks and improved operational efficiency.
results: Achieved significant cost savings and improved delivery performance

title: Strategic Procurement Process Optimization
description: Developed and implemented robust procurement strategies that streamlined import sourcing, enhanced supplier relationships, and achieved 8-10% reduction in material expenses through optimized tracking and supply management.
results: 8-10% reduction in material costs and improved supplier performance

title: Import/Export Documentation Streamlining
description: Revolutionized import documentation processes for timely consignment release, ensuring seamless coordination among Production, Sales, and Finance departments. Implemented LC compliance and risk management protocols.
results: Improved documentation processing time and reduced compliance risks

title: Supplier Relationship Management Program
description: Established comprehensive supplier relationship management program, implementing incentive systems for enhanced performance, competitive pricing negotiations, and long-term partnership development for strategic materials and services.
results: Secured competitive pricing and improved supplier performance metrics

title: Inventory Optimization & Cost Reduction
description: Implemented advanced inventory management strategies that maintained optimal stock levels while minimizing procurement costs. Developed smart inventory management systems that fast-tracked deliveries and maximized territory-wide operations.
results: Optimized inventory levels and reduced carrying costs

title: Cross-Functional Team Leadership & Development
description: Led and developed high-performing procurement teams, providing guidance, training, and performance evaluations. Fostered cross-functional coordination between departments, suppliers, and clients to align with business goals.
results: Built high-performing teams and improved departmental efficiency
